org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc

Class SimpleServerCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.ServerCall<SimpleServerRpcConnection>
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.SimpleServerCall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RpcCall, RpcCallContext, RpcResponse

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
class SimpleServerCall
extends ServerCall<SimpleServerRpcConnection>
    Datastructure that holds all necessary to a method invocation and then afterward, carries the result.
